meanings.definition: Failing to produce the intended result.
meanings.sent1: The abortive attempt to fix the broken toy left it in pieces.
meanings.sent2: Her abortive efforts to grow tomatoes in the winter were in vain.
meanings.sent3: The abortive cake baking session resulted in burnt cookies instead.
meanings.sent4: His abortive plan to surprise her with flowers wilted before he could execute it.
meanings.sent5: The abortive rocket launch ended in a puff of smoke and disappointment.

meanings.definition: Cut short without achieving the intended result.
meanings.sent1: The abortive meeting ended abruptly before any decisions were made.
meanings.sent2: Their abortive vacation was ruined by a sudden storm.
meanings.sent3: The abortive movie night was interrupted by a power outage.
meanings.sent4: The abortive race was stopped halfway due to a thunderstorm.
meanings.sent5: The abortive conversation left important matters unresolved.

meanings.sent1: His abortive attempts to fix the leaky faucet only made it worse.
meanings.sent2: The abortive search for the missing keys turned the house upside down.
meanings.sent3: The abortive fishing trip ended with an empty cooler and sunburns.
meanings.sent4: Her abortive dieting efforts were sabotaged by late-night snacks.
meanings.sent5: The abortive job interview left him feeling discouraged and defeated.
